GAMEPLAY_WaterskinDescription.English: A simple waterskin made from rabbit pelts. Holds up to 3 liters (102 oz).
GAMEPLAY_WaterskinDescription.German: Ein einfacher Wasserschlauch aus Kaninchenpelzen. Fasst bis zu 3 liter.

GAMEPLAY_MetalWaterBottleDescription.English: A reusable water bottle. Ubiquitous in modern society. Holds 750mL (25 fl oz) of water.
